topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393a64063687252d9f30000#post_5393a64063687252d9f30000
[bq="QuasarNova"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393a6286368725562bb0000#post_5393a6286368725562bb0000

Me!
[/bq]
Okay; it's about the time I got caught looking at porn when I should have been doing work.  This one time I was supposed to be doing a ton of work and instead like I said I was looking at porn right on the clock too; not even having the work minimized to press quickly in case someone walked in.  Lo and behold my boss was in the room and saw what I was doing.  You would think you would get in shit tons of trouble for that; instead they give me a handjob and that's the benefit of being self employed.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
